what_you_do: CEO and Founder of Positive Prime; executive coach, business advisor, keynote speaker, and creator of Positive Prime technology.
who_you_serve: Executives, organizations, teams, and individuals seeking personal and professional transformation through positive psychology and neuroscience-based approaches.
social_proof: Bestselling author, world-class keynote speaker, angel investor, inventor of Lithos Therapy, has lived and worked in over 5 regions of the world including the UK, Europe, USA, Australia & Asia, featured in magazines and newspapers.
signature_programs: Positive Prime, Lithos Therapy, i am gr8ful for you (book), i am gr8ful for life (book)
audience_type: B2B and B2C - executives, organizations, teams, and individuals
business_focus: Helping individuals and organizations achieve personal and professional transformation through positive psychology, neuroscience, and the Science of Positive Priming.
service_provided: Executive coaching, business advisory, consulting, keynote speaking, training workshops, 1-on-1 coaching sessions (30 min/$300, 1 hr/$500, 10-session package/$3000), customized corporate programs
